name: cryptgeon
description: Cryptgeon is a self-hosted note sharing service focused on encryption and automatic expiration. Users can create messages or files that auto-delete after being viewed, ideal for private link sharing via a temporary UI.
features: End-to-End Encryption: Messages encrypted before leaving your browser. Zero-knowledge security.
Auto-Expiration: Notes self-destruct after being read once. Perfect for sensitive data.
File Sharing: Share encrypted files with automatic deletion. Secure temporary transfers.
No Registration: Create and share notes without accounts. Instant privacy.
Time Limits: Set custom expiration times for messages. Control data lifetime.
Self-Hosted: Run your own secure note service. Complete privacy control.
